title: Milk chocolate mousse with chocolate tuiles and physalis sauce
ingredients: ['For the mousse', '40g egg yolks', '20g caster sugar', '100ml milk', '325ml double cream', '300g milk chocolate (40% cocoa solids), melted', 'For the chocolate circle and tuiles', '200g dark chocolate (70% cocoa solids)', '100g white chocolate', 'For the physalis sauce', '100g physalis (see tip)', '50g caster sugar', '1 tablespoon water']
